headline: A Quest That Has Translated Into New Investments
summary: My research colleague, John Bleday, and I have spent a lot of our time looking for great companies. How has the translated into new investments? Find out.

headline: Progressive's quarterly profit rises on strong insurance demand
summary: Property and casualty insurance company Progressive Corp reported a 19% rise in its fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by strong demand for personal auto insurance policies.  ...
